quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Barney Miller and Abc
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, abc. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: This veteran actor who played Nick Yemana on the TV show Barney Miller died in January of 1979.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jack Soo

questions.question: Which of these singers has never appeared on the Mickey Mouse Club?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jessica Simpson

questions.question: What was the first  name of  Detective Fishs wife in the comedy series Barney Miller?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bernice

questions.question: Who has never been a host on ABCs The View?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Julia Barr

questions.question: Of the following, who did not play one of Roseannes children on the show Roseanne?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Garret Hazen

questions.question: Which TV show was a spin-off  from the Barney Miller series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fish

questions.question: Which of the following soap operas is on ABC (American Broadcasting Company)?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: One Life to Live

questions.question: Spider-Man and His Amazing Friends was a popular cartoon which aired on ABC for 4 years in the 80s.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Was Linda Lavin from the popular 70s show Alice ever a regular cast member on the hit television show Barney Miller?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: Which of these is not an ABC TV show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Empty Nest

questions.question: What year did the popular show Barney Miller finally leave the airwaves?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1982

questions.question: What was the name of the know-it-all detective, played by Steve Landesberg on the show Barney Miller?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Detective Arthur Dietrich

questions.question: Who played Detective Wojohowicz in the hit television series Barney Miller?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Maxwell Gail

questions.question: How many years was the show American Bandstand aired on ABC?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 30

questions.question: What year did Good Morning America first begin broadcasting on ABC?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1975

options.text: Peter accepts a promising job proposal in another town
Chris witnesses a robbery and the family is put in a witness protection program
Lois sister is expecting a baby
Peter has committed a robbery and has to hide from the police

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chris witnesses a robbery and the family is put in a witness protection program
